```py
scipy.fft.rfft(x, n=None, axis=-1, norm=None, overwrite_x=False, workers=None, *, plan=None)
```

```py
>>> import scipy.fft
>>> scipy.fft.fft([0, 1, 0, 0])
array([ 1.+0.j,  0.-1.j, -1.+0.j,  0.+1.j]) # may vary
>>> scipy.fft.rfft([0, 1, 0, 0])
array([ 1.+0.j,  0.-1.j, -1.+0.j]) # may vary 
```
